Text:
function ERU_EP04_02()
    -- .序章-2【10月第3週】「“姫皇”の涙」
    SaveData.Title = "“姫皇”の涙"

    -- //BG：グラウンド（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG012ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //SE：虫の鳴き声・ループ開始
PLAY_SE("SEe005.wav",1000,true)

    MSG([[ It had been several weeks since I first started taking walks at night—finally, I found her on the nighttime school grounds. ]])

    -- //SE：虫の鳴き声・ループ停止
STOP_SE("SEe005.wav")

    -- //BU：エルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0511.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】smile
"Tan-tan tanuki’s squishy little tummy~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Super chubby and wobbly-wobbly~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //注釈：「たぬきの金玉」の替え歌です。元ネタが汚いことは知りません。

    MSG([[ Hermes-san was singing happily while swinging her arms energetically. I restrained myself from bursting into a run out of joy at finally meeting her and instead slowly approached. ]])

    MSG([[ To Hermes-san, I must be an unexpected visitor. I needed to speak calmly so as not to surprise her. ]])

    MSG([[ While I was thinking that— ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM17.wav",1500,true)

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,300,Ease.InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-100,300,Ease.InCubic)
    WAIT(300)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_ERU01ea")
    LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-300)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,50,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,200,Ease.InCubic)
    WAIT(200)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0512.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】smile
"Miiiiiinaaaaaaa-chaaaaaan~~~~~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    MSG([[ She ran straight toward me at full force. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1294.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】flustered
"Eh!? W-wait a minute!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ She was charging forward recklessly like a boar. If I didn’t stop, we would collide head-on, so I froze in place. ]])

    MSG([[ But Hermes-san didn’t stop. She came barreling toward me at full speed. ]])

    MSG([[ W-wait, wait, wait—— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //CG：エルメスハグ（ミナト）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV012ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0513.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】
"Baaaaaammmmmmmmmm<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1295.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】
"Hyaaah!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0514.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】
"Long time no see, long time no see! What’s up, what’s up? Minachan, have you awakened to the joys of the school at night? Have you awakened?" ]])

    MSG([[ It was the usual routine now. I was helplessly hugged and squeezed tightly with all her strength. ]])

    MSG([[ If one of Hermes-san’s fans saw this scene, they’d probably punch me. ]])

    MSG([[ I bitterly chuckled, thinking how unchanging Hermes-san’s energy was... ]])

    -- //BG：グラウンド（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG012ba")
    -- //BU：エルメス（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ After a while being hugged, she finally let me go, and we resumed our nighttime stroll around the academy as before. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0511.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】smile
"Tan-tan tanuki’s squishy little tummy~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Super chubby and wobbly-wobbly~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    MSG([[ It seemed to be her current favorite, as Hermes-san continued singing the same parody song repeatedly while hopping along. ]])

    MSG([[ There was something strangely familiar about her behavior. Yes, she resembled the children from the nursery school that Uran-san and I often volunteered with. ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes-san’s innocence reminded me of a child who keeps repeating a newly learned song non-stop. Including how she quickly loses interest and switches to another song. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0001.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】smile
(Though I’ve been tired lately because of Daria-san, watching Hermes-san somehow soothes me. Now I understand why she’s so popular nationwide.) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0002.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】flustered
(...No, no time to be soothed! I have to properly ask what the word ‘Almeria’ means!) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I gave my suddenly slack brain a jolt. ]])

    MSG([[ I caught up to Hermes-san walking ahead, faced her, and asked the question I’d been eager to hear the answer to. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1296.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】normal
"Hermes-san, actually, I came today with a question for you." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0515.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】surprised
"A question? Sure, sure, come on! Bring it on, you cute phenomenon!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1297.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】serious
"You might think I’m about to say something strange, but actually, I have a feeling we met somewhere long ago." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1298.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】serious
"Hermes-san, do you have any memory of meeting me?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0516.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】smile
"Nope!" ]])

    MSG([[ That was an immediate answer. I wish she’d think about it a bit more. ]])

    MSG([[ I had expected it, but drawing information from Hermes-san is never straightforward. ]])

    MSG([[ I have to be prepared for a long battle and keep asking steadily— ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1299.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】flustered
"Th-then, do you remember the name ‘Almeria’?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0517.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】smile
"Almeria? Yeah, she exists." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1300.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】serious
"Actually, earlier when I was talking to Hermes-san, the name ‘Almeria’ suddenly came to mind. But I personally have no memory of it..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1301.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】serious
"If you have any clue about the name ‘Almeria,’ even a tiny piece of information, please tell me—" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1302.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】flustered
"Wait, wait!? W-what do you mean she ‘exists’?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I inadvertently reacted comically. ]])

    MSG([[ To think I’d find any clue about ‘Almeria’ so easily. ]])

    MSG([[ Feeling relief deep in my heart that it wasn’t just my delusion or misunderstanding, I grew excited by this unexpected development and my heart raced. ]])

    MSG([[ I timidly asked the ever-cheerful Hermes-san once again. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1303.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】flustered
"What do you mean ‘Almeria exists’?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0518.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】smile
"Hmm? I mean Almeria-chan exists, exists, that’s what it means<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0519.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】wink
"If you don’t understand, I’ll switch over now." ]])

    -- //CI：156
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ Saying that, Hermes-san gently tapped her head like knocking on a door. ]])

    MSG([[ Then, a strange scene unfolded right before my eyes. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0520.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】normal
"Ally, let’s switch now~" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0071.wav")
    MSG([[
【Almeria】normal
"...No. Don’t speak for me without asking." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0521.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】flustered
"Eh!? W-what do you mean no? You’re the first person who’s wanted to meet Ally! Let’s get along properly~" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0072.wav")
    MSG([[
【Almeria】wry smile
"Nemesia Mama told me to keep me a secret, didn’t she? You idiot… See, Minachan is looking at us all puzzled, so let’s just stop this talk now." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0522.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】serious
"That’s mean, idiot! I just want Ally to be happy and smile, that’s all!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1304.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】flustered
"W-what’s gotten into you all of a sudden?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It was like Hermes-san was acting alone, voicing two roles one after another. Getting angry, calming down, being surprised—it was a busy performance. ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes-san likes jokes and surprises, so maybe she’s deliberately playing two characters to entertain me? ]])

    MSG([[ Still, the skit seems excessively elaborate... ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

    -- //effect：揺れ
    EFFECT_SCREEN(1,10,5,2000,false,false)
    PLAY_SE("SEd010.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0523.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】flustered
"Ah—" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1305.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】flustered
"Is this an earthquake—?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The ground shook. In G Prefecture, where earthquakes are rare, it was quite a strong tremor. ]])

    MSG([[ As I felt the shaking, a chill ran through my whole body. My consciousness slipped away, and I nearly collapsed on the spot. ]])

    MSG([[ The trauma from past earthquakes and the numbness in my legs that triggers—there’s nothing I can do about it even in front of others. ]])

    MSG([[ Yet my awareness snapped sharply at what was happening right in front of me. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0524.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】sadness
"Kyu..." ]])

    -- //BU：なし
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1306.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】flustered
"H-Hermes-san!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ In front of me, Hermes-san collapsed forward. ]])

    MSG([[ —If she fell face-first, she could get hurt! ]])

    MSG([[ I instantly kicked off the ground and slid my body between the ground and Hermes-san. ]])

    -- //SE：肉の接触音
PLAY_SE("SEa013.wav")
WAIT(300)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_plus0003.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】sadness
"Ugh" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Pressed down by the surprisingly heavy Hermes-san’s body, a frog-like croak escaped my throat. ]])

    MSG([[ It stings... but I’m glad I made it in time. ]])

    -- //BU：アルメリア（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Looking up at Hermes-san on my back, she was completely unconscious. ]])

    MSG([[ What on earth is going on? Confused by the unexpected string of events, I was at a loss. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：グラウンド（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG012ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    MSG([[ Afterward, I carried the unconscious Hermes-san and moved her to a nearby lawn. ]])

    -- //BU：アルメリア（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("almeria_plus0001.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】*Almeria・surprised
"Ha—M-Mina-chan...? Why am I..." ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1306_2_1.0.1.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】normal
"Good, you woke up. I was worried when you suddenly collapsed just after the earthquake hit." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01da")
PLAY_VOICE("almeria_plus0002.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】*Almeria・sadness
"Earthquake...? W-why now, why just an earthquake..." ]])

    MSG([[ Just as I thought she had woken up, Hermes-san muttered to herself. ]])

    MSG([[ Then, with an expression completely unlike her usual self, weak and silent tears began to flow. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0073.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】*Almeria・sadness
"Huu—huu—" ]])

    MSG([[ I heard sobs of trying to hold back from Hermes-san’s mouth. There was no trace of her usual brightness in that expression. ]])

    MSG([[ Surprised at how she had completely transformed into a different person, I said nothing and just sat beside her. ]])

    MSG([[ Somehow, I felt I shouldn’t leave her side. I didn’t want to. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0074.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】Almeria・sadness
"A-aren’t you going to ask anything...? About me?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1307.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】flustered
"Eh!? H-honestly, I’m really curious, but it seems like there’s some special reason." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1308.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】sadness
"I thought asking might be rude..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Hearing my words, Hermes-san smiled. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0075.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】Almeria・smile
"You’re really no different from before, Mina-chan, even though you’re scared yourself..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1309.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】surprised
"Eh...? B-before...? You said earlier you first met me here at the academy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0076.wav")
    MSG([[
【Hermes】Almeria・smile
"Ah... yeah, the ‘Hermes’ side, sure. But the original personality of this body is called ‘Almeria.’" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1310.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】smile
"Ah, I see." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1311.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】flustered
"...Whaaaaaaat!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ That felt like an unbelievably information-dense statement. ]])

    MSG([[ ‘Almeria’ is the original personality? So that means the usual Hermes-san is a different person? Like the ‘split personality’ thing often seen in manga or dramas? ]])

    MSG([[ No good. My head can’t keep up at all. I have so many questions, but I can’t form them properly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("almeria_plus0003.wav")
    MSG([[
【Almeria?】Almeria・smile
"Hehe, sorry, sorry. It must be confusing to be told something like this out of the blue." ]])

    MSG([[ Smiling at me holding my head, Hermes-san stood up. Then she winked mischievously and spoke. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0077.wav")
    MSG([[
【Almeria?】Almeria・smile
"For details... well, if you go on a date with me next time, I’ll tell you. Sorry, but it seems like time’s up for today." ]])

    -- //SE：鼓動
PLAY_SE("SEa003.wav")
WAIT(600)
    -- //年上に弱いミナトのトキメキ

    MSG([[ Speaking like that, Hermes-san showed no childishness at all, but rather a mature, confident smile like big sister Marika. ]])

    -- //SE：ヘリコプターの音
PLAY_SE("SEg001.wav")
WAIT(400)

    MSG([[ It looked like the pickup helicopter arrived. ]])

    MSG([[ —No way. After finally meeting, it’s already time to say goodbye. ]])

    MSG([[ Desperately turning over in my mind, I blurted out the question I’d been most curious about. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1312.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】serious
"Um! Almeria-san, have you ever met me before?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    MSG([[
【Almeria?】surprised
"" ]])
    -- //ボイス無し。表情を見せるのみ。

    MSG([[ Hermes-san’s smile faded, her cheeks flushed. Then trembling words were returned— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0078.wav")
    MSG([[
【Almeria?】blush
"...Yes, we have. The time I spent with you is the only thing that supports who I am now." ]])

    -- //BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
    -- //effect：アルメリアがヘリコプターのロープを掴んで飛び去るように

    MSG([[ Saying just that, Hermes-san grabbed the helicopter’s rope and flew off into the distant sky. ]])

    MSG([[ Left alone, I whispered as if praying. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1313.wav")
    MSG([[
【Minato】sadness
"We’ll meet again, right... Almeria-san?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //SE：心臓の音
PLAY_SE("SEa025.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ Inside my chest, my heart continued pounding loudly like the buzzer that signals the start of a stage play— ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP04_03")
end
